GLL.MEMBER_NO,
(SELECT IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_IMAGE GI WHERE IMG_ORDER = 0 AND GI.GOODS_NO = GS.GOODS_NO) IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_SELL GS
LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, GOODS_NO FROM GOODS_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo}) GLL ON (GS.GOODS_NO = GLL.GOODS_NO)

AND SELLER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE
MEMBER_ADDRESS LIKE '%${item}%'
)
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATED_AT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATED_AT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATED_AT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATED_AT) * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATED_AT < 30 THEN FLOOR(SYSDATE - CREATED_AT) || '일 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATED_AT < 365 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATED_AT) / 30) || '달 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATED_AT,
